column1: 6301,Mighty Avengers (2007) #2,2,121242,8,"ULTRON IS BACK and, yes, now he's a she. What?? Ultron's a girl?? It's Ultron as only Frank Cho can bring it. And the Mighty Avengers haven't had a moment to get to know each other before they are thrown into one of the most epic adventures in the history of the Avengers.",
